mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.`EVENT` ( FolderID , FolderType , EventType , LinkEventID , MasterEventID , Subject , Description , Place , IsPublic , IsDisplay , IsInviteOther , ImportanceState , OwnerCode , RegisterCode , MultiRegisterName , RegistDate , ModifierCode , ModifyDate , DeleteDate ) VALUES ( #{FolderID} # 일정 구분 폴더 ID , #{FolderType} # 일정 구분 폴더 Type , #{EventType} # '': 일반일정, M: 반복일정 중 개별일정 , A: 개인일정(참석자가 승인하여 생긴 개인일정), F: 자주 쓰는 일정 , #{LinkEventID} # NULL , #{MasterEventID} # NULL , #{Subject} # 일정 제목 , #{Description} # 일정 설명 , #{Place} # 장소 , #{IsPublic} # 공개여부 , #{IsDisplay} # 'Y' , #{IsInviteOther} # 참석자 다른사람 초대 권한 , #{ImportanceState} # 중요도 , #{OwnerCode} # 운영자. 개인일정시 사용자 코드 , #{RegisterCode} # 등록자 , #{MultiRegisterName} # 등록자 명 , NOW(3) # 등록일 , #{ModifierCode} # 수정자 , NOW(3) # 수정일 , #{DeleteDate} # NULL );
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();

INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.EVENT_REPEAT ( EventID , AppointmentStartTime , AppointmentEndTime , AppointmentDuring , RepeatType , RepeatYear , RepeatMonth , RepeatWeek , RepeatDay , RepeatMonday , RepeatTuesday , RepeatWednseday , RepeatThursday , RepeatFriday , RepeatSaturday , RepeatSunday , RepeatStartDate , RepeatEndType , RepeatEndDate , RepeatCount , RepeatAppointType ) VALUES ( #{EventID} #EVENT의 ID , #{AppointmentStartTime} #시작시간 (시간만) , #{AppointmentEndTime} #종료시간 (시간만) , #{AppointmentDuring} #진행시간 (지정하지 않았으면 NULL) , #{RepeatType} #반복유형 (지정하지 않았으면 '') , #{RepeatYear} #년 반복기준 (지정하지 않았으면 NULL) , #{RepeatMonth} # 월 반복기준 (지정하지 않았으면 NULL) , #{RepeatWeek} # 주 반복기준 (지정하지 않았으면 NULL) , #{RepeatDay} # 일 반복기준 (지정하지 않았으면 NULL) , #{RepeatMonday} # 월요일 반복여부 (지정하지 않았으면 NULL) , #{RepeatTuesday} # 화요일 반복여부 (지정하지 않았으면 NULL) , #{RepeatWednseday} # 수요일 반복여부 (지정하지 않았으면 NULL) , #{RepeatThursday} # 목요일 반복여부 (지정하지 않았으면 NULL) , #{RepeatFriday} # 금요일 반복여부 (지정하지 않았으면 NULL) , #{RepeatSaturday} # 토요일 반복여부 (지정하지 않았으면 NULL) , #{RepeatSunday} # 일요일 반복여부 (지정하지 않았으면 NULL) , #{RepeatStartDate} # 반복 시작일 , #{RepeatEndType} # 반복 종료유형 (지정하지 않았으면 '') , #{RepeatEndDate} # 반복 종료일 , #{RepeatCount} # 반복 횟수 (지정하지 않으면 NULL) , #{RepeatAppointType} # 반복 지정유형 (지정하지 않았으면 NULL) );
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();

INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.EVENT_DATE ( EventID , RepeatID , StartDateTime , StartDate , StartTime , EndDateTime , EndDate , EndTime , IsAllDay , IsRepeat ) VALUES ( #{EventID} # EVENT의 ID , #{RepeatID} # EVENT_REPEAT의 ID , #{StartDateTime} # 시작일시 , #{StartDate} # 시작일 , #{StartTime} # 시작시간 , #{EndDateTime} # 종료일시 , #{EndDate} # 종료일 , #{EndTime} # 종료시간 , #{IsAllDay} # 종일여부 , #{IsRepeat} # 반복여부 );
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();

INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.EVENT_RESOURCE_BOOKING ( DateID , EventID , ResourceID , ApprovalDate , ApprovalState , RealEndDateTime , DeleteDate ) VALUES ( #{DateID} # EVENT_DATE의 ID , #{EventID} # EVENT의 ID , #{ResourceID} # Resource의 폴더 ID , #{ApprovalDate} # NULL , #{ApprovalState} # NULL , (SELECT EndDateTime FROM covi_smart4j.EVENT_DATE WHERE DateID = #{DateID}) , NULL );

INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.EVENT_RELATION ( ScheduleID , ResourceID , Reserved1 , Reserved2 ) VALUES ( #{ScheduleID} # EVENT의 ID , #{ResourceID} # Resource의 폴더 ID , #{Reserved1} # NULL , #{Reserved2} # NULL );

INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.EVENT_NOTIFICATION ( EventID , DateID , RegisterCode , RegisterKind , IsNotification , IsReminder , ReminderTime , IsCommentNotification , MediumKind ) VALUES ( #{EventID} # EVENT의 ID , #{DateID} # EVENT_DATE 의 ID , #{RegisterCode} # 알림 등록자 , #{RegisterKind} # 알림 등록자 종류 , #{IsNotification} # 알림 설정 여부 , #{IsReminder} # 미리알림 여부 , #{ReminderTime} # 미리알림 설정 시간 , #{IsCommentNotification} # 댓글알림 여부 , #{MediumKind} # 알림 매체 종류 (Mail;ToDo;) );

INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.EVENT_NOTIFICATION ( EventID , DateID , RegisterCode , RegisterKind , IsNotification , IsReminder , ReminderTime , IsCommentNotification , MediumKind ) VALUES ( #{EventID} # EVENT의 ID , #{DateID} , (SELECT RegisterCode FROM covi_smart4j.EVENT WHERE EventID = #{EventID}) # 등록자 , 'R' , #{IsNotification} # 알림 설정 여부 , #{IsReminder} # 미리알림 여부 , #{ReminderTime} # 미리알림 설정 시간 , #{IsCommentNotification} # 댓글알림 여부 , #{MediumKind} # 알림 매체 종류 (Mail;ToDo;) );
mapper.select: SELECT E.ResourceID AS FolderID, F.DisplayName AS ResourceName FROM covi_smart4j.EVENT_RELATION AS E LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER AS F ON E.ResourceID = F.FolderID WHERE E.ScheduleID = #{EventID}

SELECT E.FolderID ,E.FolderType ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S('ko', FD.MultiDisplayName) AS FolderName ,IFNULL(FC.Color, FD.Reserved2) AS FolderColor # 일정만을 위함 ,E.EventType ,IFNULL(E.LinkEventID, '') AS LinkEventID ,IFNULL(E.MasterEventID, '') AS MasterEventID ,E.Subject ,E.Description ,E.Place ,E.IsPublic ,E.IsInviteOther ,E.ImportanceState ,E.OwnerCode ,E.RegisterCode ,UR.PhotoPath AS RegisterPhoto ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, E.MultiRegisterName) AS MultiRegisterName ,(SELECT MailAddress FROM sys_object_user WHERE UserCode = E.RegisterCode) AS MailAddress ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, U.MultiJobPositionName) AS MultiJobPositionName ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, U.MultiJobLevelName) AS MultiJobLevelName ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, U.MultiJobTitleName) AS MultiJobTitleName ,CONCAT(Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, E.MultiRegisterName) , ' ',case when MultiJobPositionName is not null then Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, U.MultiJobPositionName) else '' end ) AS RegisterData , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, U.MultiDeptName) AS RegisterDept ,E.ModifierCode ,E.RegistDate FROM covi_smart4j.EVENT AS E INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder AS FD ON E.FolderID = FD.FolderID INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup AS U ON E.RegisterCode = U.UserCode AND U.JobType = 'Origin' LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.SCHEDULE_FOLDERCOLOR AS FC ON FC.FolderID = FD.FolderID AND FC.RegisterCode = #{UserCode} LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user AS UR ON E.RegisterCode = UR.UserCode WHERE E.EventID = #{EventID} #AND E.FolderType LIKE '%Schedule%' AND E.DeleteDate IS NULL LIMIT 1;

SELECT RepeatID ,StartDate ,EndDate ,StartTime ,EndTime ,IsAllDay ,IsRepeat FROM covi_smart4j.EVENT_DATE
EventID = #{EventID} AND DateID = #{DateID}

SELECT ResourceID AS FolderID ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName) AS ResourceName , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, IFNULL(b.MultiCodeName,'')) AS TypeName FROM covi_smart4j.EVENT_RELATION AS ER INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER AS FD ON ER.ResourceID = FD.FolderID LEFT JOIN sys_base_code AS b ON SUBSTRING_INDEX(FD.FolderType, '.', -1) = b.Code AND b.CodeGroup = 'ResourceType' WHERE 1=1 AND ER.ScheduleID = #{EventID} AND FD.FolderType LIKE '%Resource%' AND b.DomainID = (SELECT DomainID FROM covi_smart4j.sys_base_code WHERE Code = b.Code AND CodeGroup = 'ResourceType' ORDER BY IF(DomainID = FD.DomainID, 0, 1) LIMIT 1 );

SELECT IsNotification ,IsReminder ,ReminderTime ,IsCommentNotification ,MediumKind FROM covi_smart4j.EVENT_NOTIFICATION WHERE EventID = #{EventID} AND DateID = #{DateID} AND RegisterCode = #{RegisterCode};

SELECT a.IconPath , IFNULL(a.BookingType,'') AS BookingType , IFNULL(a.ReturnType,'') AS ReturnType , IFNULL(a.BookingType,'') AS BookingTypeCode , IFNULL(a.ReturnType,'') AS ReturnTypeCode , IFNULL(a.NotificationState,'') AS NotificationState , IFNULL(a.NotificationKind,'') AS NotificationKind , a.LeastRentalTime , a.LeastPartRentalTime , IFNULL(a.DescriptionURL,'') AS DescriptionURL FROM resource AS a WHERE FolderID = Fn_ResourceParentIDGet_S(#{FolderID})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.event_relation ( ScheduleID, ResourceID, Reserved1, Reserved2 ) SELECT #{EventID} AS ScheduleID, ResourceID, Reserved1, Reserved2 FROM covi_smart4j.event_relation WHERE ScheduleID = #{oldEventID};
mapper.select: SELECT A.CalendarID , A.SolarDate , A.DN_ID AS DomainID , A.AnniversaryType , A.Anniversary FROM covi_smart4j.sys_calendar AS A INNER JOIN ( SELECT SolarDate, MAX(DN_ID) AS DN_ID FROM covi_smart4j.sys_calendar AS A WHERE A.Anniversary IS NOT NULL AND SolarDate >= #{StartDate} AND SolarDate < #{EndDate} AND ( DN_ID = 0 OR DN_ID = #{domainID} ) Group By SolarDate ) AS B ON A.SolarDate = B.SolarDate AND A.DN_ID = B.DN_ID WHERE A.Anniversary IS NOT NULL ORDER BY SolarDate
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM covi_smart4j.event_notification WHERE EventID = #{EventID} AND RegisterCode = #{UserCode}
mapper.select: SELECT AttenderCode AS UserCode , MultiAttenderName AS UserName , IsOutsider AS IsOutsider FROM COVI_SMART4J.EVENT_ATTENDANT WHERE EventID = #{EventID}

SELECT AttendantID, ea.EventID AS EventID, e.FolderID AS FolderID, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, sou.MultiDisplayName) AS DisplayName, e.Subject AS Subject, (SELECT MIN(ed.DateID) FROM covi_smart4j.event_date ed WHERE ed.EventID = e.EventID GROUP BY ed.EventID) AS DateID FROM covi_smart4j.event_attendant ea JOIN covi_smart4j.event e on (e.EventID = ea.EventID) JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder sof on (sof.FolderID = e.FolderID) JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user sou on (sou.UserCode = e.OwnerCode) WHERE AttenderCode = #{UserCode} AND (IsAllow = '' OR IsAllow IS NULL) AND left(e.FolderType, 8) = 'Schedule' AND sou.IsUse = 'Y' AND (SELECT MAX(ed.endDateTime) FROM covi_smart4j.event_date ed WHERE ed.eventID = e.EventID GROUP BY ed.eventid) >= #{localCurrentDate}
